name: claude-code
title: Claude Code
description: Instant access to Claude Code - Anthropic's AI coding assistant running on Apify

input.title: Actor input schema
input.description: Just run the Actor and use Claude Code with Apify. The Claude Code window will automatically open in the Actor run console.

skills.title: Skills
skills.description: List of skill packages to install for the AI coding agent. Skills are SKILLS.md files that provide specialized instructions. For more info see https://skills.sh/. Example: apify/agent-skills

initShellScript.title: Initialization Script
initShellScript.description: Optional bash script to run on startup for installing packages or setting up the environment.

idleTimeoutSeconds.title: Idle Timeout Seconds
idleTimeoutSeconds.description: Automatically shut down after this many seconds of inactivity. Set to 0 to disable. Recommended: set Actor timeout to 0 (infinite) when using this.

proxyMappings.title: Proxy Mappings
proxyMappings.description: Map external paths to local web servers. Example: [{"path": "/myapp", "target": "http://127.0.0.1:3000/myapp"}]

target.title: Local Service URL
target.description: Full URL of local service (e.g., http://127.0.0.1:18789/openclaw)
